Description: Logon at keyboard and screen of system
i.e. connection to shared folder on this computer from elsewhere on network
i.e. unattended workstation with password protected screen saver
Logon with credentials sent in the clear text. Most often indicates a logon to IIS with "basic authentication"
i.e. RunAs or mapping a network drive with alternate credentials
Logon with cached domain credentials such as when logging on to a laptop when away from the network
